com.tokelon.toktales.desktop.ui.window

Interface IWindowFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DesktopWindowFactory, LWJGLWindowFactory

    public interface IWindowFactory
    Creates windows and window builders.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IWindow create(int width, int height, String title)
      Creates a window with the given size and title.
      IWindow create(int width, int height, String title, long monitor)
      Creates a window with the given size, title and monitor.
      IWindow create(int width, int height, String title, long monitor, long share)
      Creates a window with the given size, title, monitor and share.
      IWindow createBorderless(String title)
      Creates a window in borderless fullscreen mode with the given title.
      IWindowBuilder createBorderlessBuilder(String title)
      Creates a window builder for borderless fullscreen mode with the given title.
      IWindowBuilder createBuilder(int width, int height, String title)
      Creates a window builder with the given size and title.
      IWindowBuilder createBuilder(int width, int height, String title, long monitor)
      Creates a window builder with the given size, title and monitor.
      IWindowBuilder createBuilder(int width, int height, String title, long monitor, long share)
      Creates a window builder with the given size, title, monitor and share.
      IWindow createDefault()
      Creates a window with the default properties of this factory.
      IWindowBuilder createDefaultBuilder()
      Creates a window builder with the default properties of this factory.
      IWindow createFullscreen(String title)
      Creates a window in fullscreen mode with the given title.
      IWindowBuilder createFullscreenBuilder(String title)
      Creates a window builder for fullscreen mode with the given title.
      IWindowFactory withDefaultHints()
      Sets the default window hints of this factory.

    • Method Detail

      • withDefaultHints

        IWindowFactory withDefaultHints()
        Sets the default window hints of this factory.
        Returns:
        This factory.

      • createDefault

        IWindow createDefault()
        Creates a window with the default properties of this factory.

        The default window hints will be used.

        Returns:
        A new window.
        See Also:
        withDefaultHints()

      • createDefaultBuilder

        IWindowBuilder createDefaultBuilder()
        Creates a window builder with the default properties of this factory.

        The default window hints will be used.

        Returns:
        A window builder.
        See Also:
        withDefaultHints()
